baseRule.text: Yo pana bhikkhu acelakassa vā paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā sahatthā khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā dadeyya, pācittiyaṁ.
baseRule.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 41

translations.text: Welcher Mönch auch immer einem nackten Asketen, einem Wanderasketen oder einer Wanderasketin eigenhändig eßbare oder genießbare Speise gibt, muß dafür sühnen.
If a monk gives fresh or cooked food to a naked ascetic, to a male wanderer, or to a female wanderer with his own hands, he commits an offense entailing confession.
Si un bhikkhu da con su propia mano ingeribles o consumibles a un Asceta Desnudo, un monje o una monja [de otra orden]: [La acción] ha de ser confesada

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。裸形外道。若出家男。若出家女。自手與食。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 44

fullParallels.text: 若比丘裸形外道乞。自手與食者。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 44

fullParallels.text: 若復苾芻自手授與無衣外道及餘外道男女食者。波逸底迦。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 44

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。自手與外道裸形若男若女食。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 40

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。自手與無衣出家男女食。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhu Pācittiya 52

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘！外道男外道女自手與食者皆，波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 41

translations.text: If a monk with his own hand give food to a male or female unbeliever, it is Pācittiya.
Jika seorang bhikṣu memberikan makanan kepada seorang pria non-Buddhis atau seorang wanita non-Buddhis, ia melakukan sebuah pāyattika.

fullParallels.text: 若比丘外道男外道女。自手與食者波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 41

fullParallels.text: 若比丘出家外道自手與食。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Kāśyapīya Bhikkhu Pācittiya 44

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼裸形外道。若出家男出家女。自手與食。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 29

fullParallels.text: 若復苾芻尼自手授與無衣外道及餘外道男女食者。波逸底迦。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 29

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。無衣外道出家男女自手與食波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 42
